hooks.command: bash -c '[[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" != *node_modules* ]] || (echo "ERROR: Cannot edit files in node_modules" >&2 && exit 2)'

bash -c 'if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|json|css|scss)$ ]]; then d="$(dirname "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH")"; while [[ "$d" != "/" && ! -f "$d/package.json" ]]; do d="$(dirname "$d")"; done; [[ -f "$d/package.json" ]] && cd "$d" && npx prettier --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi; true'

bash -c 'if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then osascript -e "display notification \"Claude finished\" with title \"Claude Code\""; elif command -v notify-send &>/dev/null; then notify-send "Claude Code" "Claude finished"; fi; true'
